## Vector3.subtractFromFloatsToRef() method

Subtracts the given floats from the current Vector3 coordinates and set the given vector "result" with this result

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subtractFromFloatsToRef(x: number, y: number, z: number, result: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the x coordinate of the operand |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the y coordinate of the operand |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the z coordinate of the operand |
|  result | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the Vector3 object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the current Vector3
